title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4221.1 - Time for overnight entries
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4221.1 - Time for overnight entries

State Regulations
(a) In the absence of conditions or notice to the contrary, entries for overnight
races are to be made at the office of the clerk of the course by 2 p.m. on the
day before the race. (b) All
entries and declarations of horses eligible for administration of furosemide
pursuant to section
4236.2
(b) of this

Title are required to denote the use of furosemide on the entry form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4221.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
